attributes.additional_details: The chance of corona virus cases decreasing is already low but with schools universities and colleges open the case count will further increase even if everything else is closed!
attributes.background:
Close schools, colleges and universities.
The corona virus outbreak will further develop due to a large amount of students in the same area. STOP THIS!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
